steps.title: Lodge a Hydraulic Fracturing Activity Report
steps.name: Report Details

inputs.name: title
inputs.label: STAGES/ZONES (Optional)
inputs.placeholder: e.g Stages 1-5

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Report Description
inputs.placeholder: Describe the contents of the report and its associated documents, including a summary of activities, significant results, conclusions, main methods used, areas of interest etc

inputs.name: reportAuthor
inputs.label: Report Author
inputs.subLabelAtTop: Please enter the name of the person who has authored this report

rules.name: max
params: The Report Author cannot be more than 256 characters

rules.name: min
params: The Activity End Date must be greater than the Activity Start Date
